members.signatureBeforeChange: public Rectangle getBounds (int start, int end)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Rectangle getBounds (int start, int end)
diff: -				OS.ScriptCPtoX(start - run.start, false, run.length, run.glyphCount, run.clusters, run.visAttrs, run.advances, run.analysis, piX);

-				OS.ScriptCPtoX(end - run.start, true, run.length, run.glyphCount, run.clusters, run.visAttrs, run.advances, run.analysis, piX);

+		bottom = Math.max(bottom, lineY[run.lineBreak ? lineIndex : lineIndex + 1] - lineSpacing);
